channel.title: Comments on: RSS Feeds for Press Releases

item.title: By: Aaron
item.dc:creator: Aaron
item.description:
Thanks for the pointer -- but there isn't a "press" RSS feed unless I'm totally overlooking it.
Some companies don't even do press releases. :)
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for the pointer — but there isn’t a “press” RSS feed unless I’m totally overlooking it.

Some companies don’t even do press releases. :)

item.title: By: jwiese
item.dc:creator: jwiese
item.description:
Here's where Adobe has there RSS feeds: http://www.adobe.com/support/rss/
To find it I searched on their site for "RSS".
BTW, I don't see any feed off of your companies site ;)
item.content:encoded:
Here’s where Adobe has there RSS feeds: http://www.adobe.com/support/rss/

To find it I searched on their site for “RSS”.

BTW, I don’t see any feed off of your companies site ;)
